mapper.select: select o.order_id,o.order_state_id,o.order_amount,o.member_id,(select m.member_name from `member` m where o.member_id=m.member_id) as member_name, o.order_name, o.order_phone, o.order_date from `order` o order by o.order_id desc;

SELECT o.order_id, o.member_id, o.order_date, o.order_phone, o.order_tel, o.order_name, o.order_msg, o.order_addr1, o.order_addr2, o.order_addr3, (SELECT m.member_name from `member` m where o.member_id=m.member_id and o.order_id=#{value}) as member_name, (SELECT m.member_phone from `member` m where o.member_id=m.member_id and o.order_id=#{value}) as member_phone, (SELECT m.member_email from `member` m where o.member_id=m.member_id and o.order_id=#{value}) as member_email, (SELECT o_s.order_state_admin from `order_state`o_s, `order` o where o.order_state_id=o_s.order_state_id and o.order_id=#{value}) as order_state_admin, (SELECT d.delivery_company from `delivery` d where o.order_id=d.order_id and o.order_id=#{value}) as delivery_company, (SELECT d.delivery_number from `delivery` d where o.order_id=d.order_id and o.order_id=#{value}) as delivery_number, (SELECT d_s.delivery_state_name from `delivery_state` d_s, `delivery` d where d_s.delivery_state_id=d.delivery_state_id and o.order_id=d.order_id and o.order_id=#{value}) as delivery_state_name from `order` o where o.order_id=#{value};
